song.title: Turn Your Eyes Upon Jesus
song.lyrics:
[1] . C G Am C O soul are you weary and troubled . F Dm C G No light in the darkness you see . C C7 F Fm There's light for a look at the Saviour . C G C And life more abundant and free
[C] .C G7 Am C Turn your eyes upon Je-sus, . F Dm G7 Look full in His wonderful face . C C7 F Fm And the things of earth will grow strangely dim . C G C In the light of His glory and grace.
---
[2] .C G Am C Through death into life everlasting . F Dm C G He passed, and we follow Him there . C C7 F Fm Over us sin no more hath dominion . C G C For more than conquerors we are
[3] .C G Am C His Word shall not fail you, He promised . F Dm C G Believe Him and all will be well . C C7 F Fm Then go to a world that is dying . C G C His perfect salvation to tell
